user_query: I'm a cryptocurrency investor and I want to check the balance of my Polygon holdings. Please provide me with the Polygon balance in the Ethereum network for my address 0x5e3ef299fddf15eaa0432e6e66473ace8c13d908. Additionally, give me the economic calendar for the next month to help me make informed investment decisions.

TaskList.description: Check the balance of Polygon holdings for the given Ethereum address.
Retrieve the economic calendar for the next month to inform investment decisions.
